forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with a refreshing embrace of sunshine, promising a high close to a pleasant 62 degrees as the afternoon whispers in at around 60. A brisk west-southwest wind breathes steadily at 12 to 22 mph, accompanied by occasional gusts that dance up to 28 mph, adding a spirited chill. The vast sky is kissed with a few clouds, an invitation for the sun to bathe the city in light while keeping the freshness alive—a perfect setting to appreciate the view of iconic landmarks without being obscured by fog, which appears to be holding back for the time being. Only hints of a marine layer lurk in the distance, but it seems to respect the vibrant current conditions downtown.

As the sun dips low, the evening will be partly clouded, cooling gently to a comfortable 52 degrees. Given the conditions, dressing in layers is wise; a light jacket should suffice for the day’s breezy charm and the coming evening chill. Take a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero with a hot drink in hand or find solace in a cozy café, making the most of this serene and inviting San Francisco day while the city hums quietly around you.
